name: A snowball up you face
description:
Explore the streets of Ro'ysia and make some friends along the way.

A short and funny point n' click / visual novel made in Godot Engine, made for the Winter VN Jam 2021

Currently in development. (Soon™)

Controls

  • Mouse
    • Move player cursor.
  • Left Click / Space
    • Interact with NPCs.
    • Move to the next room.
  • Right Click
    • Soon™

Music

"Chill lofi inspired", "Funky Hip Hop Lofi Jam", "Lofi hip hop", "Lofi again", "Samurai Champloo lofi 2" by Omfgdude.

"Item Shop" by Controllerhead.
